verses.verse: Then He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> on your feet <S%H7272><s%> that I may speak <S%H1696><s%> with you!"
And as He spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> me and set <S%H5975><s%> me on my feet; <S%H7272><s%> and I heard <S%H8085><s%> [Him] speaking <S%H1696><s%> to me.

Then He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> I am sending <S%H7971><s%> you to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to a rebellious <S%H4775><s%> people <S%H1471><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against Me; they and their fathers have transgressed <S%H1><s%> against Me to this <S%H6586><s%> very <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H6106><s%>

"And I am sending <S%H7971><s%> you to them who are stubborn <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6440><s%> and obstinate <S%H2389><s%> <S%H3820><s%> children; <S%H1121><s%> and you shall say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>'

"As for them, whether <S%H518><s%> they listen <S%H8085><s%> or <S%H518><s%> not – for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> – they will know <S%H3045><s%> that a prophet <S%H5030><s%> has been <S%H1961><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

"And you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> them nor <S%H408><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> their words, <S%H1697><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> thistles <S%H5621><s%> and thorns <S%H5544><s%> are with you and you sit <S%H3427><s%> on scorpions; <S%H6137><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> their words <S%H1697><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> at their presence, <S%H6440><s%> for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>
"But you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> My words <S%H1697><s%> to them whether <S%H518><s%> they listen <S%H8085><s%> or <S%H518><s%> not, for they are rebellious. <S%H4805><s%>

"Now you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to what <S%H834><s%> I am speaking <S%H1696><s%> to you; do not be rebellious <S%H4805><s%> like that rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%> Open <S%H6475><s%> your mouth <S%H6310><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> what <S%H834><s%> I am giving <S%H5414><s%> you."
Then I looked, <S%H7200><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> a hand <S%H3027><s%> was extended <S%H7971><s%> to me; and lo, <S%H2009><s%> a scroll <S%H4039><s%> <S%H5612><s%> [was] in it.

When He spread <S%H6566><s%> it out before <S%H6440><s%> me, it was written <S%H3789><s%> on the front <S%H6440><s%> and back; <S%H268><s%> and written <S%H3789><s%> on it were lamentations, <S%H7015><s%> mourning <S%H1899><s%> and woe. <S%H1958><s%>
